mapper.insert: insert into af_cc_app_snainput (from_node, to_node, src_type, from_type, to_type, link_type, cluster) VALUES (#{from_node,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{to_node,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{src_type,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{from_type,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{to_type,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{link_type,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{cluster,jdbcType = VARCHAR})

insert into af_cc_app_add (shenqingjian_no, data_type, data_value, DistrictMC, TownMC, StreetMC, BlockMC, BuildingMC, UnitMC, FloorMC, RoomMC, AddInfo) values (#{shenqingjian_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DistrictMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TownMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{StreetMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BlockMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BuildingMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{UnitMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FloorMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RoomMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AddInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into af_cc_app_cmp (shenqingjian_no, data_type, data_value, NameMC, LegalFormMC, SiteMC, AddMC) values (#{shenqingjian_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NameMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LegalFormMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SiteMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AddMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into af_cc_app_matchrst (shenqingjian_no, APP_entity_type, APP_data_type, APP_data_value, APP_data_source, EXT_entity_type, EXT_data_type, EXT_data_value, EXT_data_source, simulation_parsing, simulation_char, simulation_cluster, ext_label) values (#{shenqingjian_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{APP_entity_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{APP_data_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{APP_data_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{APP_data_source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EXT_entity_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EXT_data_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EXT_data_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EXT_data_source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{simulation_parsing,jdbcType = DECIMAL}, #{simulation_char,jdbcType = DECIMAL}, #{simulation_cluster,jdbcType = DECIMAL}, #{ext_label,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into af_cc_app_matchrst (shenqingjian_no, APP_entity_type, APP_data_type, APP_data_value, APP_data_source, EXT_entity_type, EXT_data_type, EXT_data_value, EXT_data_source, simulation_parsing, simulation_char, simulation_cluster, ext_label) values (#{shenqingjian_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'CMP', 'company', #{APP_data_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'APP', 'CMP', 'company', #{EXT_data_value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'MDK', 999, 999, 999, #{ext_label,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
